tools.name: test_connection
tools.description: Test connection to Attio MCP server

tools.name: introspect_workspace
tools.description: Get comprehensive information about the Attio workspace structure, including objects, attributes, lists, and current user permissions

tools.name: get_workspace_members
tools.description: List all workspace members and their details

tools.name: get_workspace_member
tools.description: Get details of a specific workspace member

workspace_member_id.description: The ID of the workspace member to retrieve

tools.name: get_self
tools.description: Get information about the current API token and workspace

tools.name: list_objects
tools.description: List all objects (both system and custom) in the workspace

tools.name: get_object
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific object

tools.name: create_object
tools.description: Create a new custom object in the workspace

tools.name: update_object
tools.description: Update an existing object

tools.name: get_object_attributes
tools.description: List all attributes for a specific object

tools.name: list_attributes
tools.description: List all attributes for a specific object or list

tools.name: create_attribute
tools.description: Create a new attribute on an object or list

is_multiselect.description: Whether the attribute allows multiple values

tools.name: get_attribute
tools.description: Get information about a specific attribute

tools.name: update_attribute
tools.description: Update an existing attribute

tools.name: list_select_options
tools.description: List all select options for a select attribute

tools.name: create_select_option
tools.description: Create a new select option for a select attribute

tools.name: update_select_option
tools.description: Update an existing select option

tools.name: list_statuses
tools.description: List all statuses for a status attribute

tools.name: create_status
tools.description: Create a new status for a status attribute

tools.name: update_status
tools.description: Update an existing status

tools.name: search_records
tools.description: Search for records in Attio CRM with advanced filtering and sorting options

limit.description: Maximum number of records to return (required, max: 10)

offset.description: Number of records to skip for pagination

query.description: Search criteria, filters, and sorting options

tools.name: get_record
tools.description: Get a specific record by ID with all its data

record_id.description: The ID of the record to retrieve

tools.name: create_record
tools.description: Create a new record in Attio CRM

values.description: Key-value pairs of attributes for the new record

tools.name: update_record
tools.description: Update an existing record in Attio CRM (appends to multiselect fields)

record_id.description: The ID of the record to update

values.description: Key-value pairs of attributes to update

tools.name: put_update_record
tools.description: Update an existing record in Attio CRM (overwrites multiselect fields)

record_id.description: The ID of the record to update

values.description: Key-value pairs of attributes to overwrite

tools.name: upsert_record
tools.description: Create or update a record based on matching criteria (assert operation)

values.description: Key-value pairs of attributes

matching_attribute.description: Attribute to match against for existing records

data.description: The record data with matching criteria

tools.name: delete_record
tools.description: Delete a record by ID

record_id.description: The ID of the record to delete

tools.name: get_record_attribute_values
tools.description: Get all values for a specific attribute on a record

tools.name: get_record_entries
tools.description: List all list entries for a specific record

tools.name: search_people
tools.description: Search for people in Attio CRM with filtering and sorting options

limit.description: Maximum number of people to return (required, max: 10)

offset.description: Number of people to skip for pagination

query.description: Search criteria, filters, and sorting options

tools.name: get_person
tools.description: Get a specific person by ID with all their data

person_id.description: The ID of the person to retrieve

tools.name: create_person
tools.description: Create a new person in Attio CRM

values.description: Key-value pairs of attributes for the new person (e.g., first_name, last_name, email)

tools.name: update_person
tools.description: Update an existing person in Attio CRM

person_id.description: The ID of the person to update

values.description: Key-value pairs of attributes to update

tools.name: delete_person
tools.description: Delete a person by ID

person_id.description: The ID of the person to delete

tools.name: search_companies
tools.description: Search for companies in Attio CRM with advanced filtering and sorting options. Supports complex filters with $and/$or operators, field-specific sorting, and pagination.

filter.description: Filter object to subset records. Supports complex filtering with $and, $or operators

field.description: Specific field for complex attributes like domains

sorts.description: Array of sort criteria with direction and attribute

limit.description: Maximum number of companies to return (required, max: 10)

offset.description: Number of companies to skip for pagination

query.description: Search criteria, filters, and sorting options

tools.name: get_company
tools.description: Get a specific company by ID with all its data including attributes, values, and metadata

company_id.description: UUID of the company record to retrieve

tools.name: create_company
tools.description: Create a new company in Attio CRM. Standard attributes include: domains, name, description, team, primary_location, categories, foundation_date, employee_range

values.description: Key-value pairs of attributes for the new company. Standard attributes include: domains (array), name (string), description (string), team (array of emails), primary_location (string), categories (array), foundation_date (string), employee_range (string), etc.

tools.name: update_company
tools.description: Update an existing company in Attio CRM. For multiselect attributes, values are appended to existing values

company_id.description: UUID of the company record to update

values.description: Key-value pairs of attributes to update. For multiselect attributes, values will be appended to existing values.

tools.name: assert_company
tools.description: Create or update a company using a unique attribute for matching (default: domains). If company exists, it's updated; otherwise, it's created

values.description: Key-value pairs of attributes for the company

data.description: The company data to create or update

matching_attribute.description: The ID or slug of the attribute to use for matching existing companies. For companies, 'domains' is the default unique attribute

tools.name: delete_company
tools.description: Delete a company by ID. This action cannot be undone

company_id.description: UUID of the company record to delete

tools.name: get_company_attribute_values
tools.description: Get all values for a specific attribute on a company record. Supports historic values and pagination. Cannot query historic values for COMINT/enriched attributes

company_id.description: UUID of the company record to fetch attribute values for

attribute.description: UUID or slug of the attribute to query values for (e.g., 'domains', 'name', 'description')

show_historic.description: If true, returns all historic values. If false, only current active values. Cannot be true for COMINT/enriched attributes

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return (required, max: 10)

offset.description: Number of results to skip for pagination

tools.name: get_company_entries
tools.description: List all list entries across all lists where this company is the parent record. Useful for finding which lists contain this company

company_id.description: UUID of the company record to fetch entries for

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return (required, max: 10)

offset.description: Number of results to skip for pagination

tools.name: search_deals
tools.description: Search for deals in Attio CRM with filtering and sorting options

limit.description: Maximum number of deals to return (required, max: 10)

offset.description: Number of deals to skip for pagination

query.description: Search criteria, filters, and sorting options

tools.name: get_deal
tools.description: Get a specific deal by ID with all its data

deal_id.description: The ID of the deal to retrieve

tools.name: create_deal
tools.description: Create a new deal in Attio CRM

values.description: Key-value pairs of attributes for the new deal. Standard attributes include: name (string), stage (string), owner (string/email), value (number), associated_people (array), associated_company (object)

tools.name: update_deal
tools.description: Update an existing deal in Attio CRM

deal_id.description: The ID of the deal to update

values.description: Key-value pairs of attributes to update

tools.name: assert_deal
tools.description: Create or update a deal based on matching criteria (assert operation)

values.description: Key-value pairs of attributes for the deal

matching_attribute.description: The ID or slug of the attribute to use to check if a deal already exists. The attribute must be unique.

data.description: The deal data with matching criteria for assert operation

tools.name: delete_deal
tools.description: Delete a deal by ID

deal_id.description: The ID of the deal to delete

tools.name: get_deal_attribute_values
tools.description: Get all values for a specific attribute on a deal record

deal_id.description: The ID of the deal record

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return

tools.name: get_deal_entries
tools.description: List all list entries for a specific deal record

deal_id.description: The ID of the deal record

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return (default: 100, max: 1000)

tools.name: list_lists
tools.description: Get all lists in the workspace

tools.name: create_list
tools.description: Create a new list

tools.name: get_list
tools.description: Get details of a specific list

tools.name: update_list
tools.description: Update an existing list

tools.name: search_list_entries
tools.description: Search entries in a specific list

limit.description: Maximum number of entries to return (max: 10)

tools.name: add_to_list
tools.description: Add a record to a list as a new entry

parent_record.description: ID of the parent record to add to the list

values.description: Additional attribute values for the list entry

tools.name: upsert_list_entry
tools.description: Create or update a list entry by parent record

values.description: Attribute values for the list entry

tools.name: remove_from_list
tools.description: Remove an entry from a list

entry_id.description: ID of the entry to remove

tools.name: get_list_entry
tools.description: Get a specific list entry by ID

entry_id.description: ID of the entry to get

tools.name: update_list_entry
tools.description: Update a list entry (appends to multiselect fields)

entry_id.description: ID of the entry to update

values.description: Attribute values to update

tools.name: put_update_list_entry
tools.description: Update a list entry (overwrites multiselect fields)

entry_id.description: ID of the entry to update

values.description: Attribute values to overwrite

tools.name: get_list_entry_attribute_values
tools.description: Get all values for a specific attribute on a list entry

tools.name: list_notes
tools.description: List notes, optionally filtered by record

record_id.description: Optional: filter notes by record ID

limit.description: Maximum number of notes to return (required, max: 10)

offset.description: Number of notes to skip for pagination

tools.name: get_note
tools.description: Get a specific note by ID

note_id.description: The ID of the note to retrieve

tools.name: create_note
tools.description: Create a new note for a record

record_id.description: ID of the record to attach the note to

tools.name: delete_note
tools.description: Delete a note by ID

note_id.description: The ID of the note to delete

tools.name: list_tasks
tools.description: List all tasks in the workspace

limit.description: Maximum number of tasks to return (required, max: 10)

offset.description: Number of tasks to skip for pagination

tools.name: get_task
tools.description: Get a specific task by ID

task_id.description: The ID of the task to retrieve

tools.name: create_task
tools.description: Create a new task

assignee_id.description: Optional: ID of the workspace member to assign the task to

deadline_at.description: Optional: deadline for the task (ISO 8601 format)

linked_records.description: Optional: array of record IDs to link to the task

tools.name: update_task
tools.description: Update an existing task

task_id.description: The ID of the task to update

is_completed.description: Mark task as completed or incomplete

tools.name: delete_task
tools.description: Delete a task by ID

task_id.description: The ID of the task to delete

tools.name: list_threads
tools.description: List comment threads, optionally filtered by record or entry

record_id.description: Optional: filter threads by record ID

entry_id.description: Optional: filter threads by list entry ID

limit.description: Maximum number of threads to return (required, max: 10)

offset.description: Number of threads to skip for pagination

tools.name: get_thread
tools.description: Get all comments in a thread

thread_id.description: The ID of the thread to retrieve

tools.name: create_comment
tools.description: Create a new comment on a record, list entry, or existing thread

record_id.description: Optional: ID of record to comment on (for new thread)

entry_id.description: Optional: ID of list entry to comment on (for new thread)

thread_id.description: Optional: ID of existing thread to reply to

tools.name: get_comment
tools.description: Get a specific comment by ID

comment_id.description: The ID of the comment to retrieve

tools.name: delete_comment
tools.description: Delete a comment by ID

comment_id.description: The ID of the comment to delete
